channel.title: EV battery stock on FinanClub

item.title: 1130 QS
item.description: score:1130 Chances: QuantumScape announced the pricing of an underwritten public offering of its Class A common stock, which may indicate the company’s efforts to raise capital and develop its innovative EV charging technology. Shares of QuantumScape have soared more than 50% in the past three months, and the company’s plan to sell $300 million in additional shares could be seen as a positive move by investors.
